meanings.definition: The physical gap or interval between two objects
meanings.sent1: The spaces between the houses were filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: He measured the spaces between the bookshelves to fit in the new books.
meanings.sent3: The tiny spaces between the rocks made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent4: The spaces between the stars seemed infinite in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The spaces between the buildings allowed a glimpse of the distant mountains.

meanings.definition: A blank character used to separate words or elements in writing or printing
meanings.sent1: Remember to put spaces between each word when writing a sentence.
meanings.sent2: The spaces between the lines made the text easier to read.
meanings.sent3: The missing spaces in the document caused confusion in the instructions.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed freely in the spaces between the lines of her journal.
meanings.sent5: The spaces between the musical notes added rhythm to the song.
